scope.description: The name of the scope to apply permissions to.

principal.description: The principal in which the permission is applied.

permission.description: The permission level applied to the principal.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Creates or overwrites the Access Control List (ACL) associated with the given principal (user or group) on the specified scope point.
